alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 03 at 7:11PM CDT until May 03 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Sherman County in the Panhandle of Texas... East central Dallam County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 710 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles south of Stratford, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Stratford, Cactus and Conlen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
